Package master

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Attacker
    This class defines a Attacker role for the robot.
    BeaconLocalizer
    This class contains methods which do a search for the beacon and re-orient the NXT according to the detected position of the beacon.
    BTConnector
    This class contains methods that allow to access a remote/slave NXT and gets its various motors and sensors.
    BTListen  
    Clamp
    This class defines a Clamp object and a set of methods allowing the clamp to grab onto or release an object.
    Defender
    This class defines a Defender role for the robot.
    Forklift
    This class defines a Forklift object along with methods that control it's movement.
    LightLocalizer  
    Navigation  
    Odometer  
    Role
    This abstract class defines a Role which only contains constructors common to both Attacker and Defender.
    TwoWheeledRobot  
    USLocalizer  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Forklift.LiftLevel  
    USLocalizer.LocalizationType
